item.title: Learning C# - My journey from low-code to mo-code
item.author: mail@michael365.de (Michael Pucknat)
item.description: So it begins I started (or tried to) start learning C# two weeks ago with some youtube videos, but somehow did not get into the right mood to start out seriosly. Then I stumbled over this Tweet by Scott Hanselmann : I really like freecodecamp.org and tried it last year to learn some javascript. In combination with content from Microsoft Learn this seems like a great way to finally start digging into C#.
